title: Insane lag but connection to ISP is perfect
body: I am lagging terribly bad in games and it seems that only a few others are as well. My ping to my ISP is 11 but in game upwards of 300 to the league servers. How can I fix this?

replies.body: I have this same problem.  Most of the time I get ping of around 40 to League servers, but randomly it jumps to 300.  Seems to happen the most at night.
this happens to me was well, usually im fine at 40 ping in game then it drops to 1000 for a few minutes about when minion spawns then its fine again ruining my lanes

Is the ping consistent or sudden, like lag spikes?  Even if your internet is solid, you can have problems accessing specific servers like the game server.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an idea of your specific issue.  Let me know what you find!

I just restarted my modem and computer and ran a ping test using 104.160.131.3 for the NA server. The average was 60ms but there were spikes for a couple pings at a time about double that. It says that I lost 0 packets throughout the whole test. Loading up an actual game now to see if the problem exists there.

It is a sudden change from my normal 60 ish to something much higher. It will end up staying at that ping for about a minute or so and then drop back down. I also noticed that it pretty much always happens when large fights are happening. I'll try restarting my modem again to see if that fixes it.
